scripts.deploy: near contract deploy aggregator.guantong.testnet use-file ./build/ormp_aggregator.wasm without-init-call network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.inspect: near contract inspect aggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet now
scripts.meta: near contract call-function as-read-only aggregator.guantong.testnet contract_source_metadata json-args {} network-config testnet now
scripts.storage: near contract view-storage aggregator.guantong.testnet all as-json network-config testnet now
scripts.clear: near contract call-function as-transaction aggregator.guantong.testnet _clear_state json-args {} prepaid-gas '100.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as aggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.publish-external: near contract call-function as-transaction aggregator.guantong.testnet publish_external json-args '{"request_id": "70021766616531051842153016788507494922593962344450640499185811468","mpc_options":{"nonce":"2","gas_limit":"1000000","max_fee_per_gas":"305777608991","max_priority_fee_per_gas":"2500000000"}}' prepaid-gas '300.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.report: near contract call-function as-transaction aggregator.guantong.testnet report json-args '{"request_id":"70021766616531051842153016788507494922593962344450640499185811472","answers":[{"data_source_name":"test-source","result":"42161,0x13b2211a7cA45Db2808F6dB05557ce5347e3634e,13,0xefcbc34cee4879b91a214d075c3efa5e624ecbe1384d6d7b61e0ab22064ec428"}],"reward_address":"0x9F33a4809aA708d7a399fedBa514e0A0d15EfA85"}' prepaid-gas '300.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '13828125000000000000000 yoctonear' sign-as reporter1.xapi.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.set-publish-config-event: near contract call-function as-transaction aggregator.guantong.testnet set_publish_chain_config json-args '{"chain_id":"421614","xapi_address":"0xAEA071B8252B6Dcaa1B33D0624599DaEFF8f1bf3","reporters_fee":"12000000000000","publish_fee":"2000000000000"}' prepaid-gas '100.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '3.1 NEAR' sign-as aggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.sync-publish-config: near contract call-function as-transaction aggregator.guantong.testnet sync_publish_config_to_remote json-args '{"chain_id": "421614"}' prepaid-gas '300.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.add-data-source: near contract call-function as-transaction aggregator.guantong.testnet add_data_source json-args '{"name":"421614","url":"https://ormponder.darwinia.network/arbitrum-sepolia","method":"post","body_json":{"query":"query Accepted($chainId: BigInt!, $channel: String!, $msgIndex: BigInt!) { messageAcceptedV2s(where: { messageFromChainId: $chainId, messageChannel: $channel, messageIndex: $msgIndex}) { items { messageFromChainId messageChannel messageIndex msgHash } } }"},"result_paths":["data.messageAcceptedV2s.items.0.messageFromChainId","data.messageAcceptedV2s.items.0.messageChannel","data.messageAcceptedV2s.items.0.messageIndex","data.messageAcceptedV2s.items.0.msgHash"]}' prepaid-gas '100.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '29003906250000000000000 yoctonear' sign-as aggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.remove-data-source: near contract call-function as-transaction aggregator.guantong.testnet remove_data_source json-args '{"data_source_name":"421614"}' prepaid-gas '100.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as aggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.estimate-report-size: near contract call-function as-read-only aggregator.guantong.testnet estimate_report_deposit json-args '{"request_id":"111111","answers":[{"data_source_name":"123","result":"456"}]}' network-config testnet now
